title: Textile Sample, "Ombra Stripe Verel"
medium:
Medium: Verel (70%) rayon(16%) and linen (14%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave bordered by gauze weave, joined by long weft floats
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 30.5 x 30.5 cm (12 x 12 in.)
description: Vertical bands of plain weave in dark brown, light grey, tan, dark grey, and light brown connected by a gauze weave of long weft floats in light brown. Number 446.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile Sample, "Ombra Stripe Verel".
Medium: Verel (70%) rayon(16%) and linen (14%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave bordered by gauze weave, joined by long weft floats. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-1173.
